Looking at the code, the NPE can only be caused by the 'parser' field being null. However it is tested and set to a non-null value on the line before, and it is never set to null in any other code.

It sounds like a VM problem. What VM are you using ?

I am using the following VM:

java.runtime.name=Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition

Then I don't know what happened. Please reopen if you have steps to reproduce.
